wikipedia_page.main: Michael John Watkins (born 9 January 1952 in Abercarn) is a former Welsh rugby union player who won four caps for Wales as a hooker. He played club rugby for Cardiff and Newport and county rugby for Monmouthshire.

response: *9 January – Mike Watkins, Wales international rugby captain

Res: Gwyn Evans, Gareth Davies, Ray Giles, Billy James, Gareth Roberts
